Summary: Over four years of alien contact
divs: Sighting Details We have had aliens of all sorts, interacting with us because we have been verified to be with advanced abilities with higher beings genes. I sent photos of aliens around us to a qualified ufo scientist, anthropologist, and behavioral scientist. He doused the pictures to find that our pictures had bio-electric-photic signatures. He then found that meant my son, and
